name: Fetish research and sex work Q&A
description:
I've worked as a sex worker (of varying sorts) for ten years, and also do a bunch of sex and fetish-oriented research, with what might be the largest, most comprehensive dataset in the world right now.

If you want to ask any questions about anything related to these things, come ask me! There's no question too dumb or invasive. 

(Also, if you have specific things you're curious about, feel free to message me in advance on telegram @theaellagirl with your question so I can go find the answer in my dataset before the Q&A)
